Are you or someone you know leaking GCs?

One way to find out is to run a resource checking application.  Check out this
one: http://freedesktop.org/Software/wininfo

Compile it, run it, switch to the resources tab, and use Eclipse.  Watch the GC
or window numbers, and see if they rise really high and never go back down.  See
if you can narrow down what's leaking.
